_metadata.title: eDiscovery - Standard Case Templates
_metadata.description: Provides templates for standard eDiscovery cases with predefined search queries for common investigation scenarios: data breach investigation, HR investigation, and regulatory inquiry. Creates reusable case structures with content searches targeting Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive for rapid incident response and legal hold.
requiredLicences: Microsoft 365 E5 or E5 Compliance (eDiscovery Premium)

prerequisites: Connect to Security & Compliance PowerShell: Connect-IPPSSession
eDiscovery Manager or eDiscovery Administrator role assigned
Audit logging enabled and retained (see PV11)
Understand legal hold obligations before creating cases
These are template searches - modify date ranges, custodians, and keywords for each specific investigation
Coordinate with legal counsel before executing searches or placing holds

caseTemplates.dataBreach: Template for investigating potential data breaches - searches for exfiltration indicators, sensitive data access, and anomalous sharing patterns
caseTemplates.hrInvestigation: Template for HR-related investigations - searches for harassment, policy violations, and employee misconduct communications
caseTemplates.regulatoryInquiry: Template for regulatory inquiry responses - searches for financial records, compliance documents, and communications relevant to regulatory examinations

deploymentSteps: 2. Create the eDiscovery case using New-ComplianceCase
3. Create predefined content searches within the case
4. Modify search queries with specific dates, custodians, and keywords for the investigation
7. Apply legal holds to custodian mailboxes if required
_notes.rollbackProcedure: Remove-ComplianceCase -Identity '<CaseName>' -Confirm:$false. Note: Cases with active holds cannot be removed until holds are released. Search results are deleted when the case is removed.

parameters.Name: PV30-eDiscovery-Template-Case
parameters.Description: Template eDiscovery case with predefined searches for data breach, HR investigation, and regulatory inquiry scenarios. Clone this case and modify parameters for specific investigations.

parameters.Name: PV30-Search-DataBreach-Exfiltration
parameters.Description: Searches for indicators of data exfiltration including large file transfers, sensitive data access, and external sharing. Modify date range and custodians for specific incidents.
parameters.ContentMatchQuery: (subject:"data transfer" OR subject:"file share" OR subject:"download" OR subject:"export") AND ("confidential" OR "sensitive" OR "restricted" OR "password" OR "credentials" OR "API key" OR "secret")

createSearches._usage: Modify ContentMatchQuery date range: AND (date>=2026-01-01 AND date<=2026-02-28)

parameters.Name: PV30-Search-HRInvestigation
parameters.Description: Searches for HR-related content including harassment, bullying, discrimination, and policy violation communications. Replace custodian locations for specific employees under investigation.
parameters.ContentMatchQuery: ("harassment" OR "bullying" OR "discrimination" OR "hostile" OR "threat" OR "intimidation" OR "retaliation" OR "complaint" OR "grievance") AND (kind:email OR kind:microsoftteams)

createSearches._usage: Replace ExchangeLocation 'All' with specific custodian mailboxes: ["user1@contoso.com", "user2@contoso.com"]

parameters.Name: PV30-Search-RegulatoryInquiry
parameters.Description: Searches for financial and regulatory content relevant to regulatory examinations, audits, and inquiries. Covers financial statements, trading records, and compliance communications.
parameters.ContentMatchQuery: ("financial statement" OR "trading" OR "transaction" OR "audit" OR "compliance" OR "regulatory" OR "SEC" OR "FINRA" OR "material non-public" OR "insider") AND (kind:email OR kind:document OR kind:microsoftteams)

createSearches._usage: Modify date range and add specific custodians as directed by regulatory inquiry scope

startSearches._note: Run Start-ComplianceSearch for each search individually after modifying parameters for the specific investigation

verifyCase.expectedResult: Case exists with Status Active and CaseType eDiscovery

verifySearches.expectedResult: Three content searches listed: DataBreach-Exfiltration, HRInvestigation, RegulatoryInquiry

exportResults._note: Export search results for legal review. Use eDiscovery Export Tool to download results.
